definition: to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The system of National loan aid to the university students is perfect in US .
sentences.chinese: 美國貸學金制度是對學生進行資助的重要形式之一。

sentences.english: Many needy students in the school have gotten student loan.
sentences.chinese: 大多數貧困生都領到了貸學金。

sentences.english: The direction in which graduates will go is to be regulated by the system of scholarship and loan in our country.
sentences.chinese: 國家通過實行獎學金和貸學金制度來調節畢業生流向。
